titleStmt.title: A letter from a clergy-man in the city, to his friend in the country, containing his reasons for not reading the declaration
titleStmt.author: Halifax, George Savile, Marquis of, 1633-1695.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to George Savile, Marquis of Halifax. Cf. McAlpin Coll.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
